ISSUE.TITLE: Analyze fail if internet is Ko
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ## EXPLANATION OF THE ISSUE Mobsf will crash if internet is down ## STEPS TO REPRODUCE THE ISSUE ``` the new feature "APP Store / Play Store " will make analyze fail if internet is down ``` ## CONSOLE OUTPUT ``` [ERROR] 13/Mar/2019 20:55:56 - HTTPSConnectionPool(host='play.google.com', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /store/apps/details?id=com.chrome.canary&hl=en&gl=us (Caused by NewConnectionError('<urllib3.connection.VerifiedHTTPSConnection object at 0x1072b9a90>: Failed to establish a new connection: [Errno 61] Connection refused',)) [ERROR] 13/Mar/2019 20:55:56 - Internal Server Error: /StaticAnalyzer/ ``` ## CONTENTS OF LOG FILES ``` ```
